response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and deeply personal to you, which is why I am offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exceptional piece is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and a symbol of its owner's vision and dedication. I believe that by investing in this product, you will not only own a part of something truly remarkable but also gain access to a story and history that can enrich your life in countless ways. I look forward to discussing the details with you further and exploring how we might make this acquisition a reality.", "product_price": 950000}
